ygData.subject: Re: Pillar of Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: Obviously I am behind in my reading of this list if I am replying to messages from 5/2 :-P, but no one seems to have answered in the interim, so... I have seen
ygData.messageBody:
Obviously I am behind in my reading of this list if I am replying to
messages from 5/2 :-P, but no one seems to have answered in the interim,
so...

I have seen it on sale by Rathmana Allin, an Erudite merchant who has a
tent/shop along the zone wall in S Ro. He also has a companion orc -- name
begins with a C, and sounds Latin, and I can't remember it, sorry -- who has
a quest involving the Dervishes. Rathmana also carries a couple of other
items of interest to wizards, but I am not far advanced enough in my studies
to know how to use them.

== Inuyasha, HIE Wizard, Fennin Ro, who found this out by accident not as a
wizard, but while trying to find who would sell his troll Shadow Knight
Mugbag food and water outside of Innothule (Rathmana will do that, too).

-----Original Message-----
From: aweber <aweber@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, May 02, 1999 3:58 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Pillar of Fire


>Pillar of Fire is a research only spell.
>
>not sure how to make though.
>
>Nevyn
